mapper.select: SELECT b.inqry_id as "inqryId", b.inqry_ref_id as "inqryRefId", b.inqry_group_ord as "inqryGroupOrd", b.inqry_title as "inqryTitle", b.inqry_cntnt as "inqryCntnt", b.inqry_pwd as "inqryPwd", b.inqry_regist_date as "inqryRegistDate", b.inqry_update_date as "inqryUpdateDate", b.inqry_delete_yn as "inqryDeleteYn", b.inqry_mber_id as "inqryMberId", a.rn FROM ( select rownum rn, <<<<<<< HEAD inqry_id, inqry_title, inqry_pwd, inqry_regist_date, inqry_mber_id from ======= inqry_id, inqry_ref_id, inqry_group_ord, inqry_title, inqry_cntnt, inqry_pwd, inqry_regist_date, inqry_update_date, inqry_delete_yn, inqry_mber_id from >>>>>>> f0a70ff051f100b2c8f82d2e9a717336d18bff42 (select tb_inqry.* from tb_inqry where inqry_group_ord = 0 order by inqry_id desc ) ) A INNER JOIN tb_inqry B on A.inqry_id = B.inqry_ref_id WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY b.inqry_ref_id desc, b.inqry_group_ord

SELECT inqry_id as "inqryId", inqry_ref_id as "inqryRefId", inqry_group_ord as "inqryGroupOrd", inqry_title as "inqryTitle", inqry_cntnt as "inqryCntnt", inqry_pwd as "inqryPwd", inqry_regist_date as "inqryRegistDate", inqry_update_date as "inqryUpdateDate", inqry_delete_yn as "inqryDeleteYn", inqry_mber_id as "inqryMberId" FROM tb_inqry WHERE inqry_id=#{inqryId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_inqry (inqry_id, inqry_ref_id, inqry_group_ord, inqry_title, inqry_cntnt, inqry_pwd, inqry_regist_date, inqry_update_date, inqry_mber_id) VALUES (inqry_seq.nextval, inqry_seq.nextval, inqry_JroupOrd, inqryTitle, inqryCntnt, inqryPwd, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi'), null, 'N', inqryMberId);
